mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(treatment_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as treatment_date, treatment.treatment_id, treatment.staff_id, staff.staff_name, tests_list.test_code, tests.test_name FROM treatment, staff, tests_list, tests where treatment.staff_id = staff.staff_id and treatment.treatment_id = tests_list.treatment_id and tests_list.test_code = tests.test_code and patient_id = #{patient_id}
